justification: Ignores Team B’s needs/preferences (urgent wins, dual-threat QBs, consensus lean). Mislabels Austin Reed as a surplus QB3 despite Tier 1 status and offers him plus a Tier 1 TE for an Out Tier 3 TE—contradicts ‘upgrade TE’ rationale. No acknowledgment of B’s TE context (would love immediate TE) or that B might prefer keeping injured upside but still value immediate production. Acceptance probability is unjustified. Overall, A-centric, logically inconsistent, and weakly reasoned.
